snippet: Gunmen killed two female health workers and one police guard in northwestern Pakistan in the latest attack on people involved in a polio immunization campaign.
abstract: Gunmen open fire at anti-polio drive in Pakistan, killing two female health workers; hard-line Islamists believe vaccinations cause infertility.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed two female health workers and one police guard in northwestern Pakistan in the latest attack on people involved in a polio immunization campaign.

headline.main: Gunmen Kill Health Workers From Pakistan Polio Drive
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Kill 3 From Pakistan Polio Drive
